1.name: Starting Room
1.description: This is where your journey begins. You see doors to the north and east.

2.name: North Room
2.description: You have entered the North Room. You see a door to the south.

3.name: East Room
3.description: This is the East Room. There are doors to the west and north.

4.name: Northern Room from East
4.description: You are in the northern room connected from the east. There are doors to the south.
